scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of the Stuartand Baldwinfamilies of Staunton, Virginia, consists of two bound volumes belonging to Alexander Hugh Holmes Stuart(1807-1891). One volume is a ledger book recording legal fees, with an index, 1837-1855, and the other is a diary of business and legal transactions, 1872-1883, including a statement of the Miller fund in the back of the volume. Also present are some loose business papers found in the volumes and foldered separately.
